amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to transfer $10 million allocated for the Office of Diversity in Biomedical Research to the Spending Reduction Account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the National Institutes of Health, National Institute of General Medical Sciences, by $10,000,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 241 (Roll no. 649).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 241 (Roll no. 649).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
